name: holybook abstract
description: theoretically this isn't a book at all
A vellum book containing the hymns central to Marloss faith.  As the verses lead to each other, the text sings of unity and promised paradise.
An English translation of the Christian Bible, which originated in England in the early 1600s.
An English copy of the Eastern Orthodox translation of The Holy Bible.
An English translation of the Christian Bible, distributed free of charge by Gideons International.

name.str_pl: copies of The Guru Granth Sahib

description: A single-volume copy of the central religious texts of Sikhism.
A Muslim religious text containing an account of the sayings and actions of the prophet Muhammad.

A book that embodies the main beliefs of Discordianism.  It seems to primarily concern chaos, and features a card in the back which informs you that you are now a 'genuine and authorized Pope of Discordia'.
The oldest extant chronicle of Japan's myths and history, the stories contained in the Kojiki are part of the inspiration behind Shinto practices.

name.str_pl: copies of The Book of Mormon

description: The sacred text of the Latter Day Saint movement of Christianity, originally published in 1830 by Joseph Smith.

name.str: The Gospel of the Flying Spaghetti Monster
name.str_pl: copies of The Gospel of the Flying Spaghetti Monster

description: A book that embodies the main beliefs of the Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster.  It seems to involve a lot of pirates and some sort of invisible drunken monster made of pasta.
An English translation of the Muslim book of holy scriptures, with explanatory notes and commentaries to aid in understanding.
A collection of essays, observations, and rituals published by Anton LaVey in 1969.
This book is the canonical text of Scientology.  Written by a science fiction author, it contains self-improvement techniques and musings on psychology called Dianetics.

name.str_pl: copies of The Book of the SubGenius

description: A book about the Church of the SubGenius.  It seems to involve a salesman named J. R. "Bob" Dobbs and a concept called 'slack'.

name.str_pl: copies of The Sutras of the Buddha

description: A collection of discourses attributed to the Buddha and his close disciples.
One of the central texts of Rabbinic Judaism, the Talmud expounds upon the Hebrew Bible with teachings and opinions of thousands of rabbis.
A single-volume book containing the complete canon of the Jewish Bible.
A collection of sacred Buddhist writings describing their canons of scriptures.
A collection of sacred Hindu writings regarding the nature of reality and describing the character and form of human salvation.
A single volume containing all four Vedas, which are the oldest scriptures of Hinduism.
An English translation of several Old Norse poems.  The poems contain proverbs and stories attributed to the god Odin, many transcribed from oral history.
